props.name: sticky
props.description:
Whether to maintain the popup in the viewport after
the anchor element was scrolled out of view.

props.name: anchor
props.description:
An element to position the popup against.
By default, the popup will be positioned against the trigger.

props.name: className
props.description: 요소에 적용된 CSS 클래스 또는 컴포넌트의 상태에 따라 클래스를 반환하는 함수.

props.name: align
props.description: How to align the popup relative to the specified side.

props.name: render
props.description: 컴포넌트의 HTML 요소를 다른 태그로 대체하거나 다른 컴포넌트와 조합할 수 있습니다. 렌더링할 요소를 반환하는 `ReactElement` 또는 함수를 인수로 받습니다.

props.name: positionMethod
props.description: Determines which CSS `position` property to use.

props.name: side
props.description:
Which side of the anchor element to align the popup against.
May automatically change to avoid collisions.

props.name: sideOffset
props.description:
Distance between the anchor and the popup in pixels.
Also accepts a function that returns the distance to read the dimensions of the anchor
and positioner elements, along with its side and alignment.

The function takes a `data` object parameter with the following properties:
- `data.anchor`: the dimensions of the anchor element with properties `width` and `height`.
- `data.positioner`: the dimensions of the positioner element with properties `width` and `height`.
- `data.side`: which side of the anchor element the positioner is aligned against.
- `data.align`: how the positioner is aligned relative to the specified side.

props.name: alignOffset
props.description:
Additional offset along the alignment axis in pixels.
Also accepts a function that returns the offset to read the dimensions of the anchor
and positioner elements, along with its side and alignment.

The function takes a `data` object parameter with the following properties:
- `data.anchor`: the dimensions of the anchor element with properties `width` and `height`.
- `data.positioner`: the dimensions of the positioner element with properties `width` and `height`.
- `data.side`: which side of the anchor element the positioner is aligned against.
- `data.align`: how the positioner is aligned relative to the specified side.

props.name: collisionBoundary
type: { x: number; y: number; height: number; width: number; }
props.description: An element or a rectangle that delimits the area that the popup is confined to.

props.name: collisionPadding
type: { bottom?: number | undefined; left?: number | undefined; right?: number | undefined; top?: number | undefined; }
props.description: Additional space to maintain from the edge of the collision boundary.

props.name: arrowPadding
props.description:
Minimum distance to maintain between the arrow and the edges of the popup.

Use it to prevent the arrow element from hanging out of the rounded corners of a popup.

props.name: trackAnchor
props.description: Whether the popup tracks any layout shift of its positioning anchor.

props.name: collisionAvoidance
props.description: Determines how to handle collisions when positioning the popup.
